General.Name: Empresas la Polar SA
General.Description: Empresas La Polar S.A. operates a chain of department stores. It operates through Retail and Financial Services segments. The company's department stores provide clothing products, electrical appliances, home furniture, electronic items, personal computers, and others. It also engages in the provision of financial services through the issuance and administration of credit cards for financing in La Polar stores and related businesses; intermediation of insurance policies; and insurance brokerage business. The company sells its products through a network of 40 stores, as well as online. Empresas La Polar S.A. was founded in 1920 and is based in Santiago, Chile.
General.Address: Avenida Santa Clara No. 207, Santiago de Chile, Chile
